name: Gilberton Fuels, Inc., to use, v. Philadelphia and Reading Coal and Iron Co., Appellant
name_abbreviation: Gilberton Fuels, Inc. v. Philadelphia & Reading Coal & Iron Co.

judges: Before Schaffer, C. J., Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Parker, JJ.
parties: Gilberton Fuels, Inc., to use, v. Philadelphia and Reading Coal and Iron Co., Appellant.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The decree is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Finletter of the court below. Costs to be paid by appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Arthur Littleton, with him Penrose Hertzler, Murdoch K. Goodwin and Morgan, Lewis & Bochius, for appellant. ■
Harold Evans, of MacCoy, Brittain, Evans & Lewis and Richard W. Ledwith, for appellee. • ■ ■
casebody.head_matter:
Gilberton Fuels, Inc., to use, v. Philadelphia and Reading Coal and Iron Co., Appellant.
Argued April 22, 1941.
Before Schaffer, C. J., Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Parker, JJ.
Arthur Littleton, with him Penrose Hertzler, Murdoch K. Goodwin and Morgan, Lewis & Bochius, for appellant. ■
Harold Evans, of MacCoy, Brittain, Evans & Lewis and Richard W. Ledwith, for appellee. • ■ ■
May 12, 1941:
